    • Constructor Detail

      • Transform_PCA

        public Transform_PCA​(int[] transformPCAComponents)
        Make a new PCA transformer. Note that it will do the full PCA, but will only used the specified components for future transforms. In this case, that means that the reduced state will have transformPCAComponents.length components.
        Parameters:
        transformPCAComponents -

    • Method Detail

      • updateTransform

        public void updateTransform​(java.util.List<State> nodesToUpdateFrom)
        Description copied from interface: ITransform
        Update any necessary transform calculations. Not used by all types of transforms.
        Specified by:
        updateTransform in interface ITransform
        Parameters:
        nodesToUpdateFrom - The transform is updated using the data in this list of nodes.

      • transform

        public java.util.List<float[]> transform​(java.util.List<State> originalStates)
        Description copied from interface: ITransform
        Transform states into arrays of numbers. Potentially, this is state reduction by means of an autoencoder, PCA, etc.
        Specified by:
        transform in interface ITransform
        Parameters:
        originalStates - List of states to transform.
        Returns:
        A list of float arrays containing the transformed versions of each of the states in the input list.

      • untransform

        public java.util.List<State> untransform​(java.util.List<float[]> transformedStates)
        Description copied from interface: ITransform
        Reverse a transform, if possible. In other words, take an array of numbers and turn it into a state.
        Specified by:
        untransform in interface ITransform
        Parameters:
        transformedStates - List of float arrays containing transformed representations of states.
        Returns:
        List of states constructed by untransforming the input values.

      • compressAndDecompress

        public java.util.List<State> compressAndDecompress​(java.util.List<State> originalStates)
        Description copied from interface: ITransform
        Transform and then untransform a list of states. This can be useful to see what kinds of properties are preserved under the transformation, or what sort of things are lost by compressing the state.
        Specified by:
        compressAndDecompress in interface ITransform
        Parameters:
        originalStates - A list of states to transform/untransform.
        Returns:
        A list of states resulting from transforming and then untransforming an original list of states.

      • getOutputStateSize

        public int getOutputStateSize()
        Description copied from interface: ITransform
        Find out the number of floats used to represent each state after transformation. For model reduction, this value will be less than the number of values in a State.
        Specified by:
        getOutputStateSize in interface ITransform
        Returns:
        Number of floats that each State will be transformed into when calling ITransform.transform(List).

        Returns:
        The name of this transform.
